org.raistlic.common.config.entity

Interface ConfigEntityFactory


  • public interface ConfigEntityFactory
    The interface defines contract of a config entity factory, which is capable of creating config entity beans out of some ConfigSource .

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <E> E createConfigEntity(java.lang.Class<E> configEntityType, ConfigSource configSource, java.lang.String path)
      The method creates a new config entity bean of the specified configEntityType , based on the configuration values in the configSource .
      java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getConfigKeys(java.lang.Class<?> configEntityType)
      The method returns the config property names required to create an entity instance of the specified configEntityType, as a Set of String .
      <E> void registerDeserializer(java.lang.Class<E> type, Deserializer<E> deserializer)
      Registers the deserializer for the specified type, which is to be used when ever the factory de-serializes a value of the type.

    • Method Detail

      • createConfigEntity

        <E> E createConfigEntity(java.lang.Class<E> configEntityType,
                         ConfigSource configSource,
                         java.lang.String path)
        The method creates a new config entity bean of the specified configEntityType , based on the configuration values in the configSource .
        Type Parameters:
        E - the referenced type of the config entity bean to create.
        Parameters:
        configEntityType - the type of the config entity bean to create, cannot be null.
        configSource - the config source to be based on, cannot be null.
        path - the path prefix of the configuration properties for the config entity bean, cannot be null.
        Returns:
        the created config entity bean.
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when any of the parameters is null.

      • getConfigKeys

        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getConfigKeys(java.lang.Class<?> configEntityType)
        The method returns the config property names required to create an entity instance of the specified configEntityType, as a Set of String .
        Parameters:
        configEntityType - the config entity type to analyse, cannot be null, and must be a valid config entity type (i.e. cannot be a primitive type, must have dependencies that are annotated with ConfigProperty).
        Returns:
        the property name set required, or an empty set if none .
        Throws:
        InvalidParameterException - when configEntityType is null or is not a valid config entity type.

      • registerDeserializer

        <E> void registerDeserializer(java.lang.Class<E> type,
                              Deserializer<E> deserializer)
        Registers the deserializer for the specified type, which is to be used when ever the factory de-serializes a value of the type.
        Type Parameters:
        E - the referenced type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type to register the de-serializer for, cannot be null, cannot be any primitive box type or String , as these types will only use the built-in deserializer of the implementation.
        deserializer - the de-serializer to register, cannot be null.
